title: I Am Number Four
description: In the beginning we were nine. We left when we were very young, almost too young to remember,Almost, And now...Three are gone.We are here to keep our race alive, which was almost entirely obliterated. We're just trying to survive.Six are left.But we are hunted, and the hunters won't stop until they've killed us all.They caught Number One in Malaysia.Number Two in England.And Number Three in Kenya.I am Number Four. I know that I am next.
author: Pittacus Lore
